tldr: Affected versions of this package allow users to tamper with the MIME type of files they upload, enabling the upload of files with dangerous types. This vulnerability could potentially lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE) or other security threats.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `backpack/filemanager` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
